Style/TernaryParentheses.description:
Description

Checks for use of parentheses around ternary conditions.
Style/TernaryParentheses.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: require_no_parentheses (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['require_parentheses', 'require_no_parentheses', 'require_parentheses_when_complex'] (type: list)
AllowSafeAssignment: True (type: bool)
